name: "Death is a Bitch" Trivia Quiz | 'Family Guy'- Season 2 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What large sea creature must the Griffins try to ignore in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Squid.

	A giant squid is inside the Griffin household, and so that they don't anger it, the family decides to just ignore it.  Peter plans to ignore a breast lump that he has instead of visit a doctor, but they go anyways.

No.

	It turns out that all of Peter's test results came back negative, and he had some other minor problem.

questions.text: Who does Death say he is when Peter answers the door?
questions.explanation:
Calista Flockheart.

	Death come to take Peter away when he writes "deceased" on his hospital forms to get out of paying the bill.  It turns out that Death took him seriously.

questions.text: What was the family eating for dinner before Death came for Peter?
questions.explanation:
Turkey.

	The family was celebrating Peter's clean bill of health until Death knocked on the door.  Death becomes invited to stay for dinner.

questions.text: What does Peter say is actually Peter Griffin, causing Death to laugh so much?
questions.explanation:
A lamp.

	Peter tells Death that a lamp is Peter Griffin, and every time Lois tries to speak to Death, he begins to laugh.

questions.text: What prevents Death from killing Peter?
questions.explanation:
A sprained ankle.

	Peter runs away from Death, and when Death tries to catch up, he sprains his ankle in a puddle.  Death has to stay with the family until he's better.

questions.text: What is one thing Peter does not do when Death is incapacitated?
questions.explanation:
Drink poison.

	Peter earns money from his friends by pulling off fatal stunts.  Soon, everyone realizes that they can do things that could kill themselves and each other.

questions.text: Peter has to kill the cast of what TV show in order to show that death still applies?
questions.explanation:
Dawson's Creek.

	The four main characters from "Dawson's Creek" don't die, but Peter kills the pilots of the airplane, and the passengers are saved by movie star, Karen Black.

questions.text: Does anyone die during this episode?
questions.explanation:
Yes.

	The two pilots on the plane dies when Peter touches them.  The plane is saved and the world knows that Death is back.  Death leaves the family and everything is normal again.

questions.text: Who does not appear in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Joe.

	Although he is one of Peter's friends, Joe doesn't appear in this episode.  He will appear in the next episode called "The King is Dead".
